name: Urban CoCo Women's Basic Versatile Stretchy Flared Casual Mini Skater Skirt
reviews: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3 and a size 14-16 in pants, weighing 215lbs. Usually a 2x when wearing tops. I brought a size XL because that was the biggest size they had for the red wine colored skirt. The XXL was out of stock, but I desperately was in a rush for a holiday vaca. It was a bit tight on me, wanted to wear it like a two piece with a crop top but couldn‚Äôt because it didnt look flattering around the waist with the tightness going on. Overall the skirt looks nice and flowy. Not too long, not too short. Right above the knee, but over the thighs. Just the right length. Very nice quality. I thought I could get away with downing a size since I really needed the skirt, but I fooled myself and that‚Äôs my fault. In the end, I couldn‚Äôt wear it with a crop top. Although it does have some type of stretchy-ness to the waistband, it won‚Äôt be enough stretch for you to get away with downing a size. If you‚Äôre around my weight, you‚Äôre better off with a size XXL! Still great product though! Just wish my size wasn‚Äôt out of stock.  :(Update: I brought another skirt and this time in XXL and I love it! Worth the money! I would say this would fit up to size 18 in pants, but wouldn‚Äôt recommend anything above an 18 unless they have an XXXL. Hope this helps my plus size ladies! :)This would definitely be a flattering look for girls of all sizes. Just putting in a review for the girls who think they want to sizedown! Don‚Äôt!! Wait for your size girl! lol- Just a girl tryna help out other girls! :D
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 15 October 2023

reviews: This skirt is adorable!  Its soft and comfy and great with leggings.  You can dress it up or down and it works for any occasion.  I normally wear a 14 in pants and an XL fit perfectly.  I'm 5'2 and this hits about an inch above the knee

name: Urban CoCo Women's Basic Versatile Stretchy Flared Casual Mini Skater Skirt
reviews: I love this skirt! I usually wear XS and the small fit perfectly. The hem hits me below the knee at 5'2. It can be dressed up or just worn casually. The only thing is that the fabric is a little cheap but it's expected for the price.

name: Urban CoCo Women's Basic Versatile Stretchy Flared Casual Mini Skater Skirt
reviews: Item came in mail on schedule. Fit as expected. Need it to complete a Minnie Mouse costume. Not quite the RED I thought it would be... Like Minnie Mouse RED. A little off but it will totally work for my purposes. Recommend.

name: Urban CoCo Women's Basic Versatile Stretchy Flared Casual Mini Skater Skirt
reviews: I got the long length in black and floral, which is pretty long (I am 5'9" with long legs and the long was barely above my knees when the waist was around my belly button). Good for work, great socially if that's your jam. High quality fabric and make, but I do wish the elastic waistband was the full width of the waistband you see (it is thinner). I got a large (5'9", 175ish, larger in my legs)- it totally fit and wasn't sliding, but I may have gotten away with a medium and it would have been a little shorter but tighter around my waist. Super cute and flowy, a good staple for a wardrobe.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 15 October 2023
